name: Reverie
body:
### About the Project
This is a First Year Multimedia project.
The objective of this project was to teach us how to use responsive web design and advertise a product.

This project implements HTML, CSS, flash and JavaScript.


![Home](http://i.imgur.com/xTuEgqE.png)

![Rev](http://i.imgur.com/Xga0r58.png)

![contact](http://i.imgur.com/fxtP73A.png)

View the live demo of the [here](http://jeffersontolentino.github.io/ReverieDemo/)


Click [here](http://jeffersontolentino.github.io/) to  go back to the index page
